name: Tom and Jerry: A Nutcracker Tale
summary: 汤姆和他的军队的流浪猫接管杰里的魔法王国的生活玩具。 追着汤姆和他的亲信,杰里必须找到玩具制造商和得到帮助去赢得他的王国在日出之前当机会之窗关闭。Tom and his army of stray cats take over Jerry's magical kingdom of living toys. Chased by Tom and his cronies, Jerry must find the Toymaker and get help to win his kingdom back before sunrise when the window of opportunity closes.
